title: Create FO-01 server action
description:
Create server action for FO-01 affirmation generation.

File: app/fo-01/actions.ts

Function: generateAffirmationsFO01(options)
- Input: { name: string, intention: string, implementation?: string }
- Output: { affirmations: string[], error?: string }

Implementation:
1. Render user prompt from KV template (versions.fo-01.prompt.default)
2. Get temperature from KV
3. Create agent via createFO01Agent(implementation)
4. Call agent.generate() with rendered prompt
5. Parse JSON array response (handle both clean JSON and wrapped JSON)
6. Return affirmations array

Include fallback for parsing errors (similar to AP-01's parseResponse).

Reference: app/ag-good-ten/actions.ts for pattern
Reference: app/alt-process-1/actions.ts for JSON parsing
acceptance_criteria: Server action works, returns 100 affirmations array
